title: Poison Arrow
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Fires a magical arrow coated with the most vile and noxious toxin. Even those resistant to poison will be poisoned by it, and a small portion of its direct damage bypasses poison resistance. |

**Poison Arrow** is a monster-only spell which damages and [poisons](/Poison "Poison") a target. On impact, Poison Arrow does (70% poison, 30% physical) damage. This means that Poison Arrow deals a total of 53% damage to those with [poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), and 30% damage to those with poison immunity.

In addition to the impact damage, creatures damaged by this spell will always be poisoned (unless immune). Unlike most poison effects, resistance does *not* reduce the odds, nor does it reduce the amount of poison taken.

The following enemies cast Poison Arrow:

- S [![Aizul.png](/images/b/be/Aizul.png)](/File:Aizul.png) **[Aizul](/Aizul "Aizul")** (3d21 damage)
- H [![Arachne.png](/images/e/e0/Arachne.png)](/File:Arachne.png) **[Arachne](/Arachne "Arachne")** (3d24 damage)
- e [![Deep elf annihilator.png](/images/5/5f/Deep_elf_annihilator.png)](/File:Deep_elf_annihilator.png) **[Deep elf annihilator](/Deep_elf_annihilator "Deep elf annihilator")** (3d22 damage)
- q [![Draconian annihilator.png](/images/6/65/Draconian_annihilator.png)](/File:Draconian_annihilator.png) **[Draconian annihilator](/Draconian_annihilator "Draconian annihilator")** (3d23 damage)
- & [![Gloorx Vloq.png](/images/9/97/Gloorx_Vloq.png)](/File:Gloorx_Vloq.png) **[Gloorx Vloq](/Gloorx_Vloq "Gloorx Vloq")** (3d23 damage)
- 2 [![Green death.png](/images/4/40/Green_death.png)](/File:Green_death.png) **[Green death](/Green_death "Green death")** (3d20 damage)
- N [![Nagaraja.png](/images/b/b7/Nagaraja.png)](/File:Nagaraja.png) **[Nagaraja](/Nagaraja "Nagaraja")** (3d22 damage)
- p [![Occultist.png](/images/e/e8/Occultist.png)](/File:Occultist.png) **[Occultist](/Occultist "Occultist")** (3d19 damage)

The following enemies may be able to cast Poison Arrow, depending on their spell set:

- & [![Pandemonium lord.png](/images/c/c6/Pandemonium_lord.png)](/File:Pandemonium_lord.png) **[Pandemonium lord](/Pandemonium_lord "Pandemonium lord")** (5.2% chance)

## History

| [![Poison arrow.png](/images/8/80/Poison_arrow.png)](/File:Poison_arrow.png) Poison Arrow |                                                                           |
| :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                     | 6                                                                         |
| School1                                                                                   | [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")                               |
| School2                                                                                   | [Poison](/Poison_Magic "Poison Magic")                                    |
| Source(s)                                                                                 | - [Book of Annihilations](/Book_of_Annihilations "Book of Annihilations") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                               | 6                                                                         |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                 | 6                                                                         |

| Spell Details                           |                                                          |
| :-------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| Damage Formula                          | 4d(3.75+Power/4)                                         |
| Max Damage                              | 4d54                                                     |
| [Max Power](/Spell_power "Spell power") | 200                                                      |
| Range                                   | 7                                                        |
| Targeting                               | Beam                                                     |
| To-hit                                  | 5+Power/10                                               |
| Special                                 | [Poison](/Poison "Poison"), partially ignores resistance |

- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), Poison Arrow was a level 6 [Conjuration](/Conjurations "Conjurations")/[Poison](/Poison_Magic "Poison Magic") spell available to players.
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), Poison Arrow could not poison [demons](/Demon "Demon").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Poison Arrow was better at piercing through the player's poison resistance; it dealt 65% against poison resistant players, and 44% against poison immune ones.
- Prior to [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), 60% of Poison Arrow's damage was irresistible.
html:
Poison Arrow

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Fires a magical arrow coated with the most vile and noxious toxin. Even those resistant to poison will be poisoned by it, and a small portion of its direct damage bypasses poison resistance.

Poison Arrow is a monster-only spell which damages and poisons a target. On impact, Poison Arrow does (70% poison, 30% physical) damage. This means that Poison Arrow deals a total of 53% damage to those with poison resistance, and 30% damage to those with poison immunity.

In addition to the impact damage, creatures damaged by this spell will always be poisoned (unless immune). Unlike most poison effects, resistance does not reduce the odds, nor does it reduce the amount of poison taken.

The following enemies cast Poison Arrow:

  • S Aizul (3d21 damage)
  • H Arachne (3d24 damage)
  • e Deep elf annihilator (3d22 damage)
  • q Draconian annihilator (3d23 damage)
  • & Gloorx Vloq (3d23 damage)
  • 2 Green death (3d20 damage)
  • N Nagaraja (3d22 damage)
  • p Occultist (3d19 damage)

The following enemies may be able to cast Poison Arrow, depending on their spell set:

  • & Pandemonium lord (5.2% chance)

History

 Poison Arrow
Level 6
School1 Conjuration
School2 Poison
Source(s)
  • Book of Annihilations
Casting noise 6
Spell noise 6
Spell Details
Damage Formula 4d(3.75+Power/4)
Max Damage 4d54
Max Power 200
Range 7
Targeting Beam
To-hit 5+Power/10
Special Poison, partially ignores resistance
  • Prior to 0.25, Poison Arrow was a level 6 Conjuration/Poison spell available to players.
  • Prior to 0.18, Poison Arrow could not poison demons.
  • Prior to 0.17, Poison Arrow was better at piercing through the player's poison resistance; it dealt 65% against poison resistant players, and 44% against poison immune ones.
  • Prior to 0.6, 60% of Poison Arrow's damage was irresistible.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Poison_Arrow&oldid=70751"

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{flavour|Fires a magical arrow coated with the most vile and noxious toxin. Even those resistant to poison will be poisoned by it, and a small portion of its direct damage bypasses poison resistance.}}

'''Poison Arrow''' is a monster-only spell which damages and [[poison]]s a target. On impact, Poison Arrow does (70% poison, 30% physical) damage. This means that Poison Arrow deals a total of 53% damage to those with [[poison resistance]], and 30% damage to those with poison immunity. 

In addition to the impact damage, creatures damaged by this spell will always be poisoned (unless immune). Unlike most poison effects, resistance does ''not'' reduce the odds, nor does it reduce the amount of poison taken.

{{monsters with spell}}

==History==

|level=6
|school1={{Conjurations}}
|school2={{Poison Magic}}
|school3=

*[[Book of Annihilations]]
}}
{{AttackSpell
|name=Poison Arrow
|formula = 4d(3.75+Power/4)
|maxdmg = 4d54
|maxsp = 200
|range = 7
|target = Beam
|tohit = 5+Power/10
|special = [[Poison]], partially ignores resistance
|hit_type = normal
|hit_adder = 5
|hit_num = 1
|hit_denom = 10
|dam_calculator = calcdice
|dam_numdice = 4
|dam_adder = 15
|dam_num = 1
|dam_denom = 1}}
*Prior to [[0.25]], Poison Arrow was a level 6 [[Conjurations|Conjuration]]/[[Poison Magic|Poison]] spell available to players.
*Prior to [[0.18]], Poison Arrow could not poison [[demon]]s.
*Prior to [[0.17]], Poison Arrow was better at piercing through the player's poison resistance; it dealt 65% against poison resistant players, and 44% against poison immune ones.
*Prior to [[0.6]], 60% of Poison Arrow's damage was irresistible.
